marketing.name: Tetris Grid
marketing.rules: Use col-span-full for hero, col-span-6 for features, col-span-4 for details. Never fill 100% perfectly.

dashboard.name: Control Room Grid
dashboard.rules: Dense packing. Widgets must stretch to fill height.

containers.card: rounded-2xl border border-zinc-200 bg-white p-6 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

buttons.primary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-zinc-900 text-white font-semibold hover:bg-zinc-800 hover:scale-105 transition-all active:scale-95 shadow-lg shadow-zinc-900/20
buttons.secondary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-white border border-zinc-200 text-zinc-900 font-semibold hover:bg-zinc-50 hover:border-zinc-300 transition-all
buttons.ghost: h-10 px-4 rounded-full text-zinc-600 hover:text-zinc-900 hover:bg-zinc-100 transition-all

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-xl border-zinc-200 bg-zinc-50/50 px-4 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-rose-500/20 focus:border-rose-500 transition-all placeholder:text-zinc-400

badges.default: inline-flex items-center rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

texture.glass_highlight: after:absolute after:inset-0 after:rounded-2xl after:ring-1 after:ring-inset after:ring-white/50 after:pointer-events-none

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Use the 'Outfit' font for all headings and 'Manrope' for body text. Import them via Google Fonts in index.css.
CRITICAL: Do not use default Shadcn styling. Override with the 'rounded-2xl' and 'p-6' rules defined in layout.
CRITICAL: Use the 'Abstract Pink Flow' image as a subtle background graphic in the Hero section, perhaps with low opacity or as a side visual.
CRITICAL: Ensure all text on the 'Abstract Pink Flow' background has high contrast. Use white text with a subtle text-shadow if needed.
CRITICAL: For the Dashboard, use the 'Control Room Grid'. Do not leave gaps. Use 'bg-white' cards with 'border-zinc-200'.
CRITICAL: Implement the 'noise' texture in the body background to give it a premium feel.
CRITICAL: Use 'sonner' for all toast notifications.
CRITICAL: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
CRITICAL: Do not use gradients for text unless it is a very large headline (h1).
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, focus, active).
Never use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
